description: You need to figure out what needs to be done for the project to succeed.
duration: Wed Jan 18 2023 20:57:00 GMT+0100 (Central European Standard Time)

description: Once you know what you have to do to succeed, it’s time to take a closer look at all the necessary operations, their scope, and milestones that mark their progress.
duration: Wed May 17 2023 20:58:00 GMT+0200 (Central European Summer Time)

event: Determine the Time and Resources Needed to Complete Each Phase or Task
description: Now it’s time to check what they need to be completed on time.
duration: Wed Nov 15 2023 20:59:00 GMT+0100 (Central European Standard Time)

description: Finally, if you have already broken down each task into pieces, you can use your newly acquired knowledge to start project scheduling.
duration: Wed Mar 20 2023 20:53:00 GMT+0100 (Central European Standard Time)
